name: Marshall Corporation Limited
overview:
Marshall Corporation Limited (MCL) are in business since 1971 in various types of projects involving high-rise Buildings, Roads, Embankments, Railway Siding, Material Handling inclusive of transportation and industrial projects in Power and Steel industry.

Our Sister Concern: ICM (India) provides end to end solutions for import & export of various cargo materials. The company has under its control, 4 Riveine Jetties for loading & unloading of cargo. Our Riverine jetties are installed to the highest specifications and are of an international standard.

Our Quality Standards: We are a quality centric organization, aiming to deliver superlative range in the market. For this, we have developed a highly advanced and sophisticated quality control laboratory at our premises, where advanced quality testing equipment has been installed by us.

Our Team: With the endless support, dedication and hard work of our experts, we are ably meeting our set production targets as well as the objectives of the organization. Our professionals are familiar with the demands prevailing in the market and hold an expertise of accomplishing those specifications accordingly. They cordially perform the whole business activities, in order to cater to our clients in an efficient manner.

Client Satisfaction: We have channelized our entire efforts to provide a product range in accordance with actual client requirement. For this, we provide various solutions to our clients, which are according to their actual specified details. We make smooth and ethical business dealings with our clients, which results in getting repeated orders of our products from them. To sustain our market credibility, we ensure delivery of products within the stipulated time.

Warehouse Facilities: Our company is backed by a highly spacious warehouse, where we efficiently store our comprehensive range in a most appropriate manner and for maximum period of time. This department is skillfully managed by our specialized team of warehousing personnel, who keep appropriate records of all incoming and retrieval of the consignment.
